definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: On the night side of Saturn, the planet casts a dark shadow over its rings.
sentences.chinese: 土星的黝黑阴影投影在夜晚一侧的土星环上。

sentences.english: Gobinda Babu of our school was very dark, and short and fat.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校的戈文达先生是一位皮肤黝黑的矮胖子。

sentences.english: All around me the black fir-points stood upright and stock-still.
sentences.chinese: 我的周围，黝黑的枞树尖顶挺立着动也不动。

sentences.english: In dark skin, sun exposure can cause pigmentation and splotchiness.
sentences.chinese: 对于黝黑的皮肤，阳光照射会导致色素沉着。

sentences.english: They were burnt brown with the summer sun.
sentences.chinese: 夏天的太阳把他们晒得黝黑。

sentences.english: Small tan sesame seed-sized lice are seen scattered amongst the hairs of the head.
sentences.chinese: 芝麻大小黝黑小虱在头发中散布。

sentences.english: Gerald bronzed in the face and travel-stained from head to foot .
sentences.chinese: 杰勒德面孔晒得黝黑黝黑，从头到脚风尘仆仆。

sentences.english: Gerald bronzed in the face and travel-stained from head to foot .
sentences.chinese: 杰勒德面孔晒得黝黑黝黑，从头到脚风尘仆仆。

sentences.english: Her mother looked, is a sixty year old man with dark skin.
sentences.chinese: 她循声望去，是一个六十多岁皮肤黝黑的老汉。

sentences.english: The strong and darkly handsome visage was gaunt and haggard.
sentences.chinese: 那张孔武黝黑的英俊面孔相当的疲惫憔悴。

sentences.english: People with dark skin may observe the onset of vitiligo at any time.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤黝黑的人可能会发现在任何时候白癜风的发病。

sentences.english: With the last memory are buried in the dark soil in.
sentences.chinese: 最后带着记忆一并埋葬在了黝黑的春泥里。

sentences.english: His skin was pitch-black, and wore the out-of-date reading glasses.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤黝黑，戴着老式的近视眼镜。

sentences.english: Drops of sweat were dripping from his swarthy check but he did not rest.
sentences.chinese: 滴汗都滴从他黝黑的检查但他没有休息。

sentences.english: Indeed, that ebony painting board goes far back in history and inspires awe.
sentences.chinese: 确实，那黝黑的漆板渊穆幽深，震慑心魂。

sentences.english: The actress' bodyguard was tall, dark and handsome.
sentences.chinese: 这位女演员的保镖皮肤黝黑，又高又帅。
